response.overview: The “Passion of Iron” documentary tells the life stories of three elite bodybuilding athletes in the triangle of Ankara, Istanbul and Cyprus, witnessing 24 hours a day. It is the story of a challenging journey that started with curiosity and turned into a passion, from IFBB PRO challenges to Olympia, where the only weapons they can use are their own soul and body. This documentary, which tells the family, friends and business lives of these three athletes born into different lives, reveals the embodiment of a passion that will inspire. "It is the war of existence of those who are their own mirror and their struggle with the Passion of Iron."
response.title: Passion of Iron
